fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Dapper Disguise: Choose a player each night. You will appear as their role to investigative roles.
- Luscious Mane: If you are attacked, the attacker will be distracted by your mustache's magnificence and be role blocked the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, your Luscious Mane ability will also prevent any night immunity for the attacker.
- Impressive Facial Hair: You cannot be killed by roles that target powerful defense.
